name: Partnership for Aflatoxin Control in Africa
goal:
The Partnership for Aflatoxin Control in Africa (PACA) is a collaboration that aims to protect crops, livestock, and people from the effects of aflatoxins. By combating these toxins, PACA will contribute to improving food security, health, and trade across the African continent.

http://www.aflatoxinpartnership.org/?q=about-paca
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Health/ Food Safety/ Food/ Contaminants
Agriculture and Rural Development
EU Development Cooperation
Research and Development
